title: Introduction of Higgs Mechanism
description: Peter Higgs and others introduce the concept of a field (the Higgs field) giving mass to other particles.

title: Glashow, Weinberg and Salam Win Nobel Prize
description: Sheldon Glashow, Steven Weinberg, and Abdus Salam win the Nobel Prize in Physics for electroweak unification, which requires the Higgs mechanism.

title: Discovery of W and Z Bosons
description: The discovery of W and Z bosons at CERN confirms the electroweak theory and implies the existence of the Higgs boson.

title: Start of Large Hadron Collider
description: The Large Hadron Collider (LHC) at CERN, designed to look for the Higgs boson among other things, is switched on.

title: Higgs Boson Discovery Announced
description: CERN announces the discovery of a new particle consistent with the Higgs boson.

title: Nobel Prize for Higgs and Englert
description: Peter Higgs and Fran√ßois Englert are awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics for the theoretical discovery of a mechanism that contributes to our understanding of the origin of mass of subatomic particles.
